title: Tropical Luxury 3 Bedroom Pool Villa by Bangrak Beach
description:
Key Features
- 3 Bedroom, 3 bathroom tropical villa
- 50 meters walk to private beach
- Contemporary tropical design
- Over-sized wooden ceilings
- Infinity-edge swimming pool
- Covered Sala seating area
- Al Fresco dining area
- Sun-loungers & sun-beds
- Built in outdoor BBQ area
- Open-plan living/dining area
- Air-condition & fans in all rooms
- Outdoor terrazzo bathtubs
- Western fully equipped kitchen
- Large terrace & sun-deck
- Expansive tropical gardens
- Fully walled-in & gated
- Covered parking area
- 24 hour security guards
- Technical room & storage
- Fibre optic internet
- Land size: 740 sqm
- Freehold company
- Chanote title

Location details:
- Secure private beachside residential estate
- 50 meters walk to private beach in Bangrak
- Close to beachside restaurants & amenities
- 5 minutes drive to Fisherman's village & beach
- 5 minutes drive to International Airport
- 10 minutes to Tesco super-market & mall
- 15 minutes to nightlife of Chaweng beach

Location details:
- Area: Bangrak Beach
- City: Koh Samui
- Country: Thailand
